message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe it would be valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, $18,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $8,500. Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $18,000 represents the value I believe it holds, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but $15,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  I'm really eager to get this product, but that's the absolute maximum I can offer.
